about_the_game:
Conflux is a collectible visual novel card game




  • Main campaign featuring 30+ battle encounters with unlockable character cards and hangout events
  • Unique combat system where mechanics will change depending on your choice of character cards
  • Intuitive introduction process to get you going quickly
  • 50+ unique characters with animated abilities giving you plenty of opportunity to create compositions capable of defeating any threat
  • Fully voice acted hangouts with characters you meet during your adventures
  • Manage your character card collection and loadouts as well as unlock player-specific abilities to turn the tides of battle
  • Player vs player online card battle mode to settle waifu over meta debates
  • Modding support to allow for alternative gameplay experience and to give easy access to creating custom content
  • More features coming in the future updates

Support our game





In a stable world there is always a force that tries to kick it off-balance. The master of dark magic Eloise was able to acquire a source of a massive power and is aiming to get even more. In the assault of your home village she destroys the very last forces that were able to oppose her, leaving only a handful of knights alive capable of fighting. Without a strong leadership the lands are destined to fall into tyranny, but you are given a chance to show that even when outnumbered and devastated you can still come back as a winner. Uncover the dangers of Conflux and bring freedom back to your homeland in this unique collectible card game experience.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains suggestive clothing and romantic dating. Also, the game contains fantasy violence and dramatic scenes.

short_description: Date! Fight! Collect! Conflux is a collectible visual novel card game featuring a medieval fantasy setting with unique card battle mechanics and character hangout events. Lead the efforts to stop dark magician Eloise from brining ruin to the peaceful lands and uncover the power of Conflux.
